addingRoutePointInstructions.header: How to add a route point?
addingRoutePointInstructions.step1: Click the route on the map below. The point will appear both on the map and in the table above.
addingRoutePointInstructions.step2: The new point will be snapped to the route. If the location isn't correct, you can delete it and try again by clicking closer to the route.
addingRoutePointInstructions.step3: You can edit the point's properties by clicking the 'Edit' button in the table.

deleteButtonDisabledTooltip: Route start/end points cannot be deleted
